text: We need to update our website. The images in our "gallery" need to be swapped out with new images. Per Hub spot, they were originally added with "coding" we need to have a developer assist us in changing the codes. Or rather point to the new images.

I'm a HS developer, so I'd say I'm familiar with this. Don't understand, why anyone would ever "hard code" images into something, but this is a different topic. 

Feel free to drop me a dm with more info
